segments.text: Can you help me , please ? Is there a public restroom near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but I don't think so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no ! ! My son needs a bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there's a department store on Grant Street . There are restrooms in the basement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Between Second and Third Streets . The store is across from the hotel .
segments.speaker: S2
